Malice/ Organics:
 
Malice watched as a Maximal beat Blacknightmare around.  He suddenly lost all reason.  The Hunter Killer leapt away from the cannon and body checks Organics.
"What?!? Malice, what-" Organics said before being beat around by her own brother.
Malice savagely beat and clawed Organics, reason was beyond him now.  It ended as abruptly as it started, Organics in stasis, severly damaged.  Malice was almost completely exhausted, he felt his body slowly begin to shut down.
